title: Refunds for Rp sounds good right.
body: OK so it got me thinking how many people wanted to get a refund on something, but they had used their 3 free refunds. so i thought what if riot sold them to us for like 100rp they make money and we get the refund of that skin or champ for the even cooler one. i think it would work and be a great idea.

replies.body: I think it's a really good idea but I don't think I would use it ever haha
Didn't someone post the same thing but in a different way.
i don't remember so i put one up. :)
True, but im one of the people that would need to bye like 100 a day haha :)
